ExtDesc.message: Condor makes TweetDeck look the way it should have.

ButtonHoverTitle.message: TweetDeck Quick Launch (Added by Enhancer, disable with Right Click > Hide Button)
ButtonHoverTitle.description: Text that appears when hovering over the 'Quick Launch' tweetdeck button

ExpandedViewWarning1.message: Hi! You're seeing this because you're using the expanded tab view. The expanded tab view is currently not supported in Condor due to its new horizontal App Bar.

ExpandedViewWarning2.message: To restore the regular tab view, please press the X key on your keyboard, and TweetDeck will fix it automatically.
